definition: (bird species of China) Eurasian reed warbler (Acrocephalus scirpaceus)

sentences.english: The loss of further reed-beds led to them declining once more.
sentences.chinese: 蘆葦墊的進一步消失導致它們又一次數量驟減。

sentences.english: The reed is exhuberant frosted with the crystal white dew.
sentences.chinese: 蘆葦初生青青，白色露水凝結爲霜。

sentences.english: He was like a reed moving in wind.
sentences.chinese: 希律王就像一根隨風搖曳的蘆葦。

sentences.english: This bird inhabits in the middle space niche of reed communities.
sentences.chinese: 其巢的空間生態位是蘆葦層次中的中層。

sentences.english: Some say love it is a razor , that leaves your soul to bleed.
sentences.chinese: 有人說愛情是一條河，會把柔嫩的蘆葦淹沒。

sentences.english: In the haunts where jackals once lay, grass and reeds and papyrus will grow.
sentences.chinese: 在野狗躺臥之處，必有青草，蘆葦，和蒲草。

sentences.english: The pool rippling was caused by the waving of the reeds.
sentences.chinese: 池塘裏的潺潺聲是蘆葦搖動時引起的。

sentences.english: And certainly, whenever the wind blew, the Reed made the most graceful curtseys.
sentences.chinese: 這可不假，一旦起風，蘆葦便行起最優雅的屈膝禮。

sentences.english: Some say love, it's a river that drowns the tender reed.
sentences.chinese: 有人說愛是一條河，淹沒柔弱的蘆葦。

sentences.english: In my case, I want this layer for the water and reeds only.
sentences.chinese: 在我的這個例子中，我這個層只是爲了水面和蘆葦。

sentences.english: The reed did not even give it a second thought.
sentences.chinese: 希望是壯漢依靠的一根纖細的蘆葦。

sentences.english: It floated through the reeds of the river, and they carried its message to the sea.
sentences.chinese: 歌聲飄越過河中的蘆葦，蘆葦又把聲音傳給了年夜海。

sentences.english: It floated through the reeds of the river, and they carried its message to the sea.
sentences.chinese: 歌聲飄越過河中的蘆葦，蘆葦又把聲音傳給了年夜海。

sentences.english: Pan did not know which reed was the nymph.
sentences.chinese: 潘不知道哪根蘆葦是仙女。

sentences.english: It brought the wild duck back to the reedy marshes of the south;
sentences.chinese: 北雁南飛，去往南方蘆葦叢生的溼地。

sentences.english: He loosed his eagle, which flew back and forth above the reeds.
sentences.chinese: 他放出鷹，鷹就在蘆葦地上空盤旋。
